glossary.definition: Generates a response and token count in the format input|output|ratio without extra text.
Lists all active custom modifiers in the schema.
Synchronizes the schema with the latest changes.
Exports the current schema and glossary as JSON files.
Exports the schema as a JSON file.
Exports the context as a JSON file.

Exports the update log as a text file.
